title: How to use ‘Switch to Android’ for iPhone and transfer your data from iOS [Video]
content:
Since Android 12, you’ve been able to quickly sync all of your important data from an old iPhone to a new Google Pixel or Android device via cable. “Switch to Android” is a great option for those lacking a cable, and here’s how to use it.

more…

The post How to use ‘Switch to Android’ for iPhone and transfer your data from iOS [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: If you want to transfer data saved on your iPhone or iPad, you can now use the "Switch to Android" app. Here's just how to use it.
